participant_1.name: Evelyn
participant_1.personality: thoughtful and introspective, with a deep appreciation for literature and a strong connection to her faith.
participant_1.background: I love agatha christie novels. My husband and I have a suicide pact. I spend most of my days working at my church's food pantry. I grow the tallest sunflowers you've ever seen.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: friendly and approachable, with a love for cooking and a playful sense of humor.
participant_2.background: I'm scared of clowns. I have two dogs. I like to cook. I have two roommates. I live on the third floor in an apartment.

content.text: What do you do for fun?
I like to cook, I have two dogs, and I'm scared of clowns.
That's interesting. I love to cook too, but I don't have any pets. I'm not scared of anything, but I do have a suicide pact with my husband.
Really? Why do you have a suicide pact?
We're both terminally ill, and we don't want to suffer.
That's so sad. I'm so sorry to hear that.
It's okay. We're both ready to go.
Well, I'm glad you have each other.
We do. We're going to spend the rest of our time together making the most of it.
That's great. I'm glad you're happy.
Well, I should probably get going.
Okay. It was nice meeting you.
